'''Old Well''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Old Well is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=80}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=30}}.
